price: 113. “Xisaabtoodu waxaa leh oo keliya Rabbigay, haddaad garanaysaan.
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
